summary:
Craftable Arrows of Might. Fire, Frost, Lightning, Light, Stun and Impact arrows. Normal arrows are now Craftable as well, provided you have the smithing level perks. 

Found in the Riverwood Trader Shop, in a basket by the door. 
You have to craft more after that. 

Fire Arrows Burn like an Oil Lamp explosion.
Ice Arrows have an icey blast.
descriptionHtml:
Craftable Arrows of Might. Fire, Frost, Lightning, Light, Stun and Impact arrows. Normal arrows are now Craftable as well, provided you have the smithing level perks. 

Found in the Riverwood Trader Shop, in a basket by the door. 
You have to craft more after that. 

Fire Arrows Burn like an Oil Lamp explosion.
Ice Arrows have an icey blast.
Stun Arrows knock down a group making an easy kill. 
Lightning Arrows explode in a ball of lightning. 
Light arrows Illuminate your way. 
Steel Impact Arrows to knock a person back. 
Normal arrows are all craftable as well. 

Hope you have fun with them.

UPDATED: Changed the requirements for Fire Arrows and Steel Impact Arrows. I made the fire arrows use \"Tomes of flames\" Instead of fireball scrolls. Impact arrows now use just steel ingots and leather strips. I also made impact arrows have a smaller impact effect zone.

NOTE: I Never turned off comments, Nexus is being weird and not letting me unlock them even tho i have them set to unlocked.
author: Charrio
